Cherrycake\Request

Request

A class that represents a request to the engine, mainly used via an Action mapped into Actions module.

    Synopsis

    class Request {
    • // members
    • public  $pathComponents;
    • public  $parameters;

    • public boolean isParameterValue()

    • public mixed __get()

    • public string debug()
    }

    Members

    private

    • $cacheAdditionalCacheKeys — array
    • $parameterValues — array

    public

    • $isSecurityCsrf — boolean
    • $parameters — array
    • $pathComponents — array

    Methods

    public

    • __construct() — Request
    • __get() — Magic get method to return the retrieved value for a specific parameter for this request. retrieveParameterValues() must be called before.
    • __isset() — Magic method to check if the specified parameter has been passed or not
    • buildFormHtml() — Returns an HTML form that will call this request when submitted
    • buildUrl() — Returns a URL that represents a call to this request, including the given path components and parameter values
    • debug() — debug
    • getCacheKey() — getCacheKey
    • getParameterValue() — Gets the value retrieved for a specific parameter for this request. retrieveParameterValues() must be called before.
    • isCurrentRequest()
    • isParameterValue()
    • isSecurityCsrf()
    • retrieveParameterValues() — retrieveParameterValues
    • securityCheck() — Checks this request for security problems
